item.description:
@wicked_destiny wrote:

Q2 i made those codes in here i only need to now how u get a choice to make them u knwo in real rs u get an screen on the bottem thats sas if u want to make an short bow long bow or shafts

i want to know how i put up that screen in my server on the bottom so when i click i can make a choise of wich 1 i make

its a kind of screen when u advanca a lvl u get a screen with congratz u advanced a lvl
click to continu
but then there are pictures with a short bow long bow are shafts

item.title: Need help with fletching skill

item.description:
@wicked_destiny wrote:

1 Q

i just wrote this but i get a 100 erros message i cant find where my mistake is so it would be great if could help me with that

2 Q

How do i make it when i use a knife with a log that i can get an option if i want to make arrow shafts or a long bow or an short bow

[code]// arrows
else if(itemUsed == 1511 && useWith == 2347) {
if(playerLevel[9] >= 0) { //arrow shaft use log with hammer

deleteItem(52, getItemSlot(52), 15);
addItem(53, 15);

} else {
sendMessage(“You need a fletching level of 0 to atach the feathers to the shafts.”);
}
}

					sendMessage("You need a fletching level of 70 to craft the bow.");
				}
			}
			else if(itemUsed == 946 && useWith == 1513) {		//magic short bow (u)
				if(playerLevel[9] >= 80) {
					deleteItem(1513, getItemSlot(1513), 1);
					addItem(72, 1);
					addSkillXP(83.5, 9);
				} else {
					sendMessage("You need a fletching level of 80 to craft the bow.");
				}
			}
			else if(itemUsed == 1755 && useWith == 1513) {		//magic long bow (u)
				if(playerLevel[9] >= 85) {
					deleteItem(1513, getItemSlot(1513), 1);
					addItem(70, 1);
					addSkillXP(91.5, 9);
				} else {
					sendMessage("You need a fletching level of 85 to craftg the bow.");
				}
			}

//use chisel for long bow
//use knife for short bow
//use hammer vor arrow shafts
